column4: Hi. I recently wrote about my experience with photo management in Linux and I think it might interest some of you hearing opinions from a newbie. http://sufis.wordpress.com/2006/05/07/photo-management-in-linux/
Can anyone tell me of an easy to use photo import wizard?
I've heard that gthumb can do that, but don't quote me unless it works :)
ask on #gimp, they know a heck of a lot more
module-assistant (and the INSTALL file in the source
after it's compiled, how do I register it?
basically you copy the module into /lib/modules/linux-image-$(uname -r) somewhere and run depmod -a
evince reads them, it comes by default
